item.description:
So, there are two fairy tale shows on TV (Grimm/Once Upon a TIme), and now two fairy tale movies out at the same time. Hurray for fantasy! This one has Charlize Theron, Chris Hemsworth, and Kristen Stewart. Really, I'd see it just for the crows and the sure to please cinematography. Let's hope it's actually a good movie. If not, we'll give it the standard treatment :)

Oh, and I'll be showing up around 6:30 at Lizzy's for some ice cream before the movie if anyone's interested. (http://www.yelp.com/biz/lizzys-ice-cream-cambridge)
item.name: Snow White and the Huntsman (7:10pm @ Harvard Loews)
